QWANT.STEP1_SECTION1_TITLE: Qwant Junior et Blacknut t'offrent deux heures de jeux vidéo par semaine pendant les grandes vacances d'été !
QWANT.STEP1_SECTION3_TEXT:
Blacknut c'est un large catalogue de jeux vidéo pour toute la famille, accessible en un clic sur ton ordinateur et ta télévision.
Pas besoin de console, de PC musclé ou de matériel à acheter.
Pas dʼinstallation ni de téléchargement des jeux, joue grâce à ta connexion internet.
Sauvegarde en ligne de tes parties.
Mode multijoueur.
Un accès illimité et sans engagement pour 14,99€/mois !
QWANT.STEP1_SECTION2_TITLE: Demande à tes parents de t'inscrire à Blacknut avec le formulaire ci-dessous et ensuite de télécharger l'application !

CONFIRMATION.DESCRIPTION_0:
Bienvenue sur Blacknut
Un e-mail de confirmation vous a été envoyé.
Il ne vous reste qu'une dernière étape pour commencer à jouer, installer l'application Blacknut sur votre ordinateur et/ou votre télévision SmartTV.
CONFIRMATION.DESCRIPTION_1: <small>Si vous ne recevez pas cet e-mail de confirmation, veuillez vérifier dans le dossier “Spam” (ou “Courrier indésirable”) de votre boîte de messagerie.</small>

ERRORS.ERROR_EMAIL_EXISTS: L'adresse e-mail renseignée est déjà rattachée à un compte Blacknut. Merci de te connecter à ton compte afin de renseigner ton mode de paiement sur ta page de profil et activer ton abonnement. Aucun paiement n'a été pris en compte sur ce formulaire à ce stade. Tu ne seras ni facturé, ni débité.
ERRORS.TITLE: Nous n'avons pas pu créer ton compte Blacknut.

ERRORS.AGREE_INVALID: Veuillez accepter les conditions générales d'utilisation.

RESET_EMAIL.INVALID_REQUEST: Looks like there is a problem, be sure to click the link we sent to your new email address. For the security of your account, this link is valid 1 week. If it already expired, you can restart the email update from the begining, by filling your new email adress in your account page from the Blacknut application.

RESET_PASSWORD.DESCRIPTION_0: Please choose a new password for your Blacknut account.

ERRORS.ERROR_EMAIL_EXISTS: The email address used in the form is already attached to a Blacknut account. Please login to your account to enter your payment method on your profile page and activate your subscription. No payment has been taken into account at this point. You will not be charged.
ERRORS.TITLE: We could not create your Blacknut account.

STEP_0.TITLE: Sign up to Blacknut, and enjoy 14 days of free trial without commitment!

STEP_1.DESCRIPTION_0: Monthly subscription (€ 14.99 per month), without commitment, cancellable online at any time. You will not be charged if you cancel before {{ userTrialEndDate }}. We will send you a reminder email 3 days before. If you have a promotional code or a gift card, please fill in this information in the dedicated fields.
STEP_1.TITLE: Add a payment method.

STEP_2.DESCRIPTION_0: A confirmation email has been sent to you.
STEP_2.DESCRIPTION_1: If you do not receive this confirmation email, please check the "Spam" folder of your mailbox.
STEP_2.TITLE: Thank you {{ firstname }} for your registration to Blacknut.

STEP_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Are you ready to play?
STEP_ACCOUNT.SUBTITLE:
Try it free for 14 days with no commitment

Create your account in two simple steps.
It’s quick and there are no surprises

STEP_PAYMENT.TITLE: Choose your payment method
STEP_PAYMENT.SUBTITLE:
We just need a card on file. You can try the service free for 14 days!
Cancel your subscription before the {{ userTrialEndDate }} and you won’t be charged.
We’ll even send you an email 3 days before your billing date as a reminder so you have a chance to cancel before you get charged.

STEP_AGREEMENTS.TITLE: You’re one click away from playing your next favorite game!

SUBSCRIPTION_MODULE.SERVICE_DESCRIPTION:
A large catalog of video games for everyone, accessible in one click.
Unlimited access without no commitments for only 14.99€/month.
SUBSCRIPTION_MODULE.SERVICE_DETAILS:
• Download the app and get instant access to over a hundred games
  • No console or extra hardware required, play on multiple devices
  • All your save files are stored online
  • Challenge your friends in multiplayer games
  • New games added weekly
  • Easily manage your family’s accounts

ACCOUNT_CREDIT_CARD_FORM.SECURITY_CODE_HELP:
For Debit Cards, Visa and MasterCard, the three numbers are on the back of your card (left image).

For American Express cards the 4 digits are on the front of your card (right image).
